hanzi-su-wiki:
燃

Значения

Гореть, пылать; воспламенять, зажигать, жечь

Мнемоника

Готовить 然 быстро и на сильном огне 火.
purpleculture_pinyin:
rán
to burn; to ignite; to light; fig. to spark off (hopes); to start (debate); to raise (hopes)
сжечь; зажечь; зажечь; инжир. зажечь (надежды); начать (дебаты); поднять (надежды)
rtega_mnemonic:
燃燃RSburn, light fire, ignite
  • certainly 然 burns in the fire 火
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 然 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
燃烧 [ rán shāo ]: to ignite; to combust; to burn; combustion; flaming
燃料 [ rán liào ]: fuel
点燃 [ diǎn rán ]: to ignite; to set on fire; aflame
燃气 [ rán qì ]: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
燃油 [ rán yóu ]: fuel oil
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 然 [ rán ] certainly; naturally; suddenly
heisig_chinese_memo: Any sort of thing can ignite in the fire.
heisig_constituent: burn, fire, sort of thing, moon, crescent moon, month, flesh, part of the body, chihuahua, dog, large, drop, oven-fire, barbecue, fire2
heisig_story: Hearth . . . sort of thing. Beware of letting the simple reading off of the primitive elements do your work for you. Unless you make a vivid image of something burning and relate it just as vividly to those primitive meanings, you can count on forgetting this character very quickly.
koohiiStory1: Any sort of thing can burn in the fire.
koohiiStory2: Somebody from PETA is really angry that they sell dog meat in China, so they´ve gone to burn down the whole cart (my mnemonic for "sort of thing" was seeing strips of dog flesh roasting, and saying "well, that´s just the sort of thing they do here in China).
jp_example_words:
燃焼(ねんしょう): burning, combustion
燃料(ねんりょう): fuel
燃える(もえる): to burn
燃やす(もやす): to burn
jp_readingExamples: 燃える (も.える), 燃す (も.す), 燃やす (も.やす)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Fire in nature will burn down everything in its path. In nature, there are no firefighters or anyone to contain the fire, so the fire will burn and burn until it has no fuel left to consume.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel the fire all around you as it burns. You’re out in nature – the middle of a forest fire. Hear the woods burn and crackle as you feel the heat around you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What is the worst thing that could burn in this fire? Your nendoroid (ねん) collection. You've spent a lot of time and money collecting all these cool and rare and unique nendoroids and now they've all burned in the fire.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Cry your eyes out as you smell the smell of burning plastic from the nendoroids. Worst. Day. Ever.
Ru_Radicals: 夕 (вечер), 火 (огонь), 杰, 犬 (собака)
Ru_trainchinese: rán: (глаг) гореть; жечь, зажигать, сжигать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a fire (火) resembles (然) something burning
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Any sort of thing can ignite in the fire.

Pinyin: rán
English Definition: to burn; to ignite; to light; fig. to spark off (hopes); to start (debate); to raise (hopes)
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 火
Pictophonetic: 然 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 然 [ rán ] certainly; naturally; suddenly

燃字的基本解释

燃
rán
烧起火焰：自燃。燃料。燃烧。燃点。燃眉之急。
引火点着：点燃。燃灯。
焚烧

燃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rán］
［《廣韻》如延切，平仙，日。］
(1)焚烧。
(2)引火点着。
(3)比喻花开得红艳鲜明。
(4)比喻引发。

燃字的英文翻译

◎ 燃
burn, ignite, light

燃字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燃； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页682第07
【廣韻】俗然字。詳然字註。【元經】光熙元年夏五月範陽地燃。　又【拾遺記】周武王六年，燃丘之國獻比翼鳥。

燃字的源字形

燃字的起名意思

：烧起火焰；引火点着。

От огня его образ подобен языку пламени, выбрасывающему искры, что означает, что огонь горит; затем это первоначальное слово для обозначения горения, как жареная собака (犬) мясо (вечер) с огнем; затем (звук. исконный смысл горит.

Radicals: 火, 然  (fire, nature)
Meaning Mnemonic
Fire in nature will burn down everything in its path. In nature, there are no firefighters or anyone to contain the fire, so the fire will burn and burn until it has no fuel left to consume.
Feel the fire all around you as it burns. You’re out in nature – the middle of a forest fire. Hear the woods burn and crackle as you feel the heat around you.
Reading Mnemonic
What is the worst thing that could burn in this fire? Your nendoroid (ねん) collection. You've spent a lot of time and money collecting all these cool and rare and unique nendoroids and now they've all burned in the fire.
Cry your eyes out as you smell the smell of burning plastic from the nendoroids. Worst. Day. Ever.
